data.oai_dc:dc: Data used for the analyses of demographic and reproduction of jackals on hunted farms and unmanaged reserves. Data include: Treatment, age class, sex, body condition indices (body mass and renal fat index), and female reproduction parameters (pregnant, lactating, litter size, fecundity).
Black-backed jackal|compensatory immigration|compensatory reproduction|harvest|human-carnivore conflict|source-sink dynamics
